src:
侍ジャパン強化試合第２戦、３―０でカナダ破る

01 Nov 2019, 13:10



５回１死２塁、山田哲が適時打を放つ（１日）＝中嶋基樹撮影

　２日（日本時間３日）に開幕する野球の国際大会「プレミア１２」（読売新聞社協賛）を前に、日本代表「侍ジャパン」とカナダ代表との強化試合「ＥＮＥＯＳ侍ジャパンシリーズ２０１９」の第２戦が１日、沖縄セルラースタジアム那覇で行われ、日本が３―０で勝ち、１勝１敗で対戦を終えた。日本は２日、プレミア１２の１次ラウンドが行われる台湾に移動し、５日にベネズエラとの初戦に臨む。
text:
Defeat Canada in SAMURAI JAPAN Warm-up Game 2nd, 3-0

01 Nov 2019, 13:10



5 times, 1 death, 2 laps, Satoshi Yamada hits timely (1 day)

In front of the international baseball tournament “Premier 12” (sponsored by the Yomiuri Shimbun) starting on the 2nd (Japan time 3rd), the ENEOS Samurai Japan Series 2019 will be a match between the Japanese national team “Samurai Japan” and the Canadian national team. Round 2 was held at Okinawa Cellular Stadium Naha on the 1st, Japan won 3-0 and finished the match with 1 win and 1 loss. Japan will move to Taiwan where the first round of Premier 12 will be held on the 2nd, and will face the first game against Venezuela on the 5th.
